metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17264 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In libyal liblnk before 20191006,liblnk_location_information_read_data in liblnk_location_information.c hasa heap-based buffer over-read because an incorrect variable name is usedfor a certain offset. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inthe GitHub issue.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
